body:
```spack buildcache create``` makes an index.html file in the ```build_cache``` directory. ``` html
  • linux-centos7-x86_64-gcc-4.8.5-zlib-1.2.11-yrijbmajetpxrkyaa4uclsyw62zbhc5m.spec.yaml ``` It is missing a ```>``` between the ```href``` argument and its text value, and should look like ``` html ... index.html ... ``` I think a better option would be to suppress the generation of the index.html unless it is supposed to do more than generate a list. Web servers will automatically create static web pages when no index.html is present.
title: buildcache makes malformed HTML
